SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement
Class Function

java.lang.Object
  com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Function

public class Function
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides many static utility methods for wrapping those useful built-in functions of SQLite during constructing SQL statement.

For example:

Function.max("price") would produce a Function object which carried "max(price)" clause.

Note: Statement would calls the toString() method to take the final clause.
